A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A great film with lots of unexpected twists. I think a lot of the backlash on RT is mainly from fanboys who didn't like that their particular theories weren't borne out in the final release. But to everyone else\, enjoy the ride. I saw it in the UK last nigh and there was applause at the end from the audience. That doesn't happen very often with our far more reserved audiences!
